charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE/Possession with Intent to Distribute a Controlled Substance and 21:853 Notice of Intent to Seek Forfeiture(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Reduced Sentence per USSC Amendment - SENTENCE: BOP: 77 months  ORIGINAL SENTENCE: BOP: 92 months to run concurrent to 2 state sentences in case numbers 071903828 and 071909167; S/R: 48 months; Fine: Waived; SPA: $200; Forfeiture: $597 in U.S. Currency; a Mossberg Model 590 12-gauge shotgun, Serial No. P610992; and associated ammunition. Amended Judgment. Amended [56] JUDGMENT. Corrected page 1 to reflect dismissal of count 2.
